heading: toad kill?
subheading: murmurs that a winnie the pooh attraction will replace the beloved classic mr. toad's wild ride have raised the hackles of some hard-core toadies who are staging a protest sunday at walt disney world in orlando, florida. the demonstration will be the fifth major toad-in staged by team toad, a grassroots organization of adults, some of whom have children. the "save toad" platform and t-shirts are featured at
author: wired staff
